title: Commander Keen trading card game.
content:
I'm starting project as a break from my minigame madness project. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]
I have some card ideas already.
Here they are:
Category alien cards.

Wormouth. ( [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wormouth.gif[/img] ) :
This card wil have the ability to eat an opponents card in the play field (remove them from play).

Yorp ( [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] ) :
This card wil be safe from attacks until the next round of the activator.

Shikadi master :
This card wil be immune for every item card (e.g. the card neural stunner )

Those are my ideas so far for alien cards(haven't thought of attack and defense values yet)

Category item cards :

Neural stunner :
Removes an alien or hero card from play.

4 Teddy bears :
This card gives you back 1 life point(start with 20(you lose one if you lose a alien or hero card).

Bean with Bacon mega rocket :
This card wil safeguard all your alien and hero card for one round from attacks.

Those are the item cards so far.

Hero cards (here i wil place a description of the persons instead of the effect(they don't have them) :

Commander Keen ( [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] ) :
The defender of the universe. Today he is stil defending it proudly. And he wil never give in to Mc mire's evil plans.

Mortimer Mc mire ( [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] ) :
The evil hater of the universe. He wants to destroy it just to prove he is millions times better as Commander keen or as he says "Threefourteen".(hope i spelled that one right).

Spot ( [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] ) :
This yorp has been brought to earth by Commander Keen. On earth he's kept as a pet by Commander Keen's loving family.

And that are the hero cards i can think of right now.(and yes Mc mire is supposed to be in this category)
I cant think of anymore categories.

I got the idea of the fact that there are already so many trading card games.
And i thought of how fun it would be if i would have one to but to realize this i need as many forum members as possible helping me with it.

I hope that i am not the only one that thinks this is a good idea.

title: Re: repost card ideas please
content:
could you repost your card ideas if you still know them and if its not to much trouble add the card imige to it too.(or else the this tcg might be lost [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] )
thanks in advance(i hope ezboard restores as much posts as possible).This is not real.
You did not see this.
You werent here.

title: Re: repost card ideas please
content:
Oh my god...

after ALL THAT TROUBLE, our posts got deleted. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] [img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]

title: Re: repost card ideas please
content:
yeah all that work is lost thanks to an irritating hacker([img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] if i get my hands on that hacker i'l, i'l destroy him [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] )This is not real.

title: What?
content: You didn't copy all that stuff down somewhere else?

title: Re: What?
content:
i did copy the stuff down but the computer where i put all the stuff on could be dead [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] . and if the computer is restored i'm not certain the data on the harddrive is restored too.


*Mortimer: i destroyed that computer you should have written it by hand mwuhahahahahahaha. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]
Merder: but i was working on card designs too no way i'm doing that by hand.
Mortimer: watch your mouth mere human.
Merder: no you watch your mouth.
-=mortimer activates his robot and steps on merder=-
Merder: aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaagh!!!!!!!!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] This is not real.
